top_comments.comment: The end of the video is like when the protagonist is about to lose and they somehow win

comments_since_last_sample.body:
Spoiler Alert…kinda

Love that when Mikey wins he says - ‘I just won’ in a similar sense to Light Yagaki in Death Note 😂
jacks face at the end is priceless. John's hopes and dreams were shattered and Mikey played his cards just right.
